definition: to decline to meet a visitor/to express one's gratitude to one's guests
to thank/to apologize/to wither (of flowers, leaves etc)/to decline

sentences.english: Being busily engaged in study, Professor Smith sported his door.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯教授忙於鑽研學問，他閉門謝客。

sentences.english: The writer denied herself to visitors.
The shop sported its oak today.
Jim shut himself away for a month to catch up on his academic work.
sentences.chinese: 傑姆爲趕寫他的學術著作閉門謝客一個月。
